name: Sybil
description:
JOIN THE DISCORD COMMUNITY!: http://discord.gg/Ypu45jH

Sybil is a Retro Action Adventure about hunting for ancient relics. Help Naira restore ancient knowledge to her town.

  • 6 zones with their own enemies, puzzles and bosses to defeat, plus a final boss.
  • Original soundtrack compliments each zone
  • A variety of weapons, armors and abilities to discover
